content: this legal text summarizes a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the decision identified as iv 9472021 was made on july 28 2022 the text discusses a cost procedure where the total cost is 15300 eur divided equally among three heirs the procedure lasted from february 2 2021 to july 28 2022 the final resolution states that the total value of the goods involved is 394335 eur which will be divided among the three heirs the text also mentions the application of the inheritance act specifically article 11 in this case the deceased person was from montenegro and the court determined that the estate consists of compensation damages amounting to 394335 eur the first order of intestate heirs includes a granddaughter and a grandson of the deceased who will each receive a 13 share of the inheritance additionally there is an inheritance agreement between the heirs where one of them will receive a 13 monetary compensation based on a previous decision the deceased passed away on january 7 2022 and the court has determined that the inheritance will be distributed according to the rules of intestate succession a probate hearing is not necessary as there is no movable property in the estate the heirs have submitted an agreement for the division of the estate which has been accepted by the court the value of the estate is 394335 eur and a court fee of 15300 eur will be assessed and paid by the heirs in proportion to their shares the heirs will take possession of the movable property once the final order of succession is obtained the text also provides instructions for appealing the decision including the deadline for lodging the appeal the required documents and the payment of a court fee these instructions apply as of july 28 2022
